name: 經典翻譯（一）
description: 本課程旨在研究晚明小說《西遊記》的寫作技巧及主題思想，從而探討其英譯上的各種問題，藉以提昇學生對經典著譯的各種認識。
goals: Gaining a general understanding of the text under consideration in its native context.
Understanding how the text in question was translated and transplanted into other cultures.
syllabus:
This course is designed to familiarize students with the late Ming novel _Xiyou_ _ji_, or the _Journey to the West_.  It focuses especially on the rhetorical devices and the thematic concerns of Wu Chenen’s original and their representations in Anthony C. Yu’s English rendition of the novel
